original_text: ‘I caused many people among you to become very sick. It was like what happened many years ago in Egypt. At that time, very many people got sick. Then I sent soldiers to you. And they killed your young men and they took away your horses. The smell from dead bodies was very bad. But you still did not start to pray to me again.’ The Lord says this!
korean_text: 내가 너희 중에 전염병 보내기를 애굽에서 한 것처럼 하였으며 칼로 너희 청년들을 죽였으며 너희 말들을 노략하게 하며 너희 진영의 악취로 코를 찌르게 하였으나 너희가 내게로 돌아오지 아니하였느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I caused many people among you to become very sick
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 중 많은 사람들이 아주 병들게 하였다

sentences.original_text: It was like what happened many years ago in Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 여러 해 전 이집트에서 일어난 것과 같았다

sentences.original_text: At that time, very many people got sick
Then I sent soldiers to you
And they killed your young men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 너희의 젊은 남자들을 죽였다

sentences.original_text: and they took away your horses
The smell from dead bodies was very bad
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 시체에서 나는 냄새가 아주 끔찍했다

sentences.original_text: But you still did not start to pray to me again
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희는 여전히 다시 나에게 기도하기 시작하지 않았다
